articles.author: Paul Rhys
articles.title: Almost Zlatan: Ibrahimovic’s ex-teammate on a sliding doors story - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: A childhood friend and former teammate speaks to Al Jazeera about how Zlatan Ibrahimovic got his big break.
articles.content:
Malmö, Sweden Here is where Zlatans goal against England was created, says Tony Flygare. Zlatan says it is his taekwondo that made it, but I say its here.
Flygare points down to a space under a shed… [+5967 chars]

articles.title: Another One Of Those Spells! | Stuart Broad Takes 2 Wickets In Over | England v Ireland - England & Wales Cricket Board
articles.description: Stuart Broad takes two wickets in the same over against Ireland, in the first test of the 2023 summer.Find out more at ecb.co.ukThis is the official channel ...

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Miami Heat’s fourth-quarter rally upsets Denver Nuggets in NBA finals Game 2 - The Guardian
articles.description: Gabe Vincent scored 23 points, Jimmy Butler and Bam Adebayo each had 21 and the Heat evened up the finals by overcoming a monster effort from Nikola Jokic
articles.content: Gabe Vincent scored 23 points, Jimmy Butler and Bam Adebayo each had 21 and the Miami Heat evened up the NBA finals by overcoming a monster effort from Nikola Jokic to beat the Denver Nuggets 111-108… [+4343 chars]
